About

Hey, this is Hux.

写写代码，做做设计，
离开世界之前，一切都是过程

Hey，我是黄玄，程序员 & 设计师，Team Web。前淘宝网 · 阿里旅行前端工程师，前微影时代 · 微票儿前端基础工程团队负责人，现就职于饿了么 · 大前端团队。

一些作品和开源项目，👉 戳 演说.io、Portfolio 与 Github；除了在博客与 知乎专栏 · 一生想做浪漫极客 写点东西外，我也是 GDG 字幕组 与 前端外刊评论 · 知乎专栏 的翻译维护成员。

音乐重度依赖患者，设计师强迫症患者，书买得比看得多患者，毒舌患者，科技产品发布会观看癖患者，间歇性感伤患者，习惯性熬夜患者。

Yet another Web Developer.
Yet another Life-long Designer.

Hi, I am Huang Xuan(黄玄)，you can call me Hux. I'm an engineer & a designer who builds softwares (👉 Portfolio and Github). I studied Digital Media Art and graduated from Communication University of China in 2016.

I previsouly worked at Alibaba Trip and then led Front-End Infrastructure Team at Wepiao (see CrunchBase). Now I am working at Ele.me Front-End Engineering Team as Staff Software Engineer, focusing on performance and web app architecture.

In addition, I'm also an active member of GDG Beijing, a translator at GDG China Subtitle Team, maintainer at Frontend Magazine (in Chinese) and the owner of Lifelong Romantic Geek (in Chinese).
